## IEventListener interface

Describes a listener interface that needs to be implemented by components interested in listening to events emitted by an agent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IEventListener 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [eventTypes](./daf-core.ieventlistener.eventtypes.md) | string\[\] | Declares the event types that this listener is interested in. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [onEvent(event, context)](./daf-core.ieventlistener.onevent.md) | Processes an event emitted by the agent. |
